column6: "AGENT OF S.H.I.E.L.D." Part 3 of 6 With friends like these...who needs enemies? Hydra hits close to home in more ways than one, leaving a rehabilitated Wolverine to face off against a brainwashed, evil former X-Man. With the evil Dawn of the White Light mutants as backup, it's not looking pretty.
column8: | letterer:Randy Gentile | inker:Klaus Janson | penciller (cover):Greg Land | writer:Mark Millar | colorist:Paul Mounts | penciller:John Romita JR.
